content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- TRUNCATE TABLE [dbo].[DimMovieActors]

-- Load table
INSERT INTO [dbo].[DimMovieActors] (
	[MovieID],
    [ActorID]
)
SELECT * FROM (
	SELECT 
		ExternalTable.MovieID AS MovieID,
		ExternalTable.ActorID AS ActorID
	FROM (
		SELECT
			mov.MovieID,
			act.ActorID
		FROM
			[ext].[Catalog] cat
		LEFT JOIN
			[dbo].[DimMovies] mov
			ON cat.Title = mov.MovieTitle
		LEFT JOIN 
			[dbo].[DimActors] act 
			ON cat.ActorName = act.ActorName
		GROUP BY mov.MovieID, act.ActorID
	) ExternalTable
) CleansedTable
WHERE CleansedTable.MovieID NOT IN (SELECT MovieID FROM [dbo].[DimMovieActors])

-- Check Load
-- SELECT * FROM [dbo].[DimMovieActors]
